directions: Blend almond milk, oats, strawberries, blueberries, clementines, apple, avocado, flax seeds, honey, coconut oil, and chia seeds together in a blender until smooth, 30 to 60 seconds.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups almond milk, or as needed
1 apple, cored and cut into chunks
title: Supercharged Breakfast Smoothie
